151b2(mdo sde): zhig theg pa chen po yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos ston to// de na dang chung sems dpa' sa
151b3(mdo sde): ngo bzhis la gcig ni mi g.yo brtan pa zhes bya/ gcig shos ni shes rab 'dzin ces bya ste/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la/ btsun
151b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dus cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po 'ang ngar gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyeni gang lags ces yongasu zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar snga
151b5(mdo sde): smos pa bzhin no// yang de tshan 'og gi phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na 'jig rten
151b6(mdo sde): gyi khams gti mug mun dral zhes bya ba zhog yod/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba'i 'jigs pa bral ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po
151b7(mdo sde): dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' banyis la gcig ni rnam par snang byed rdul bral zhes bya// gcig shos ni rnam par snang
151b8(mdo sde): zhim zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe ma steng gi phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhi 'bum 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams
152a1(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pade na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rang rgyas shes pab
152a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la/ 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'
152a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po gnyis shig 'khod pa la gcig ni rang gis rnam par 'byed pas/ yul yang dag par 'khrug pa zhes bya/ gcig pos ni byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis yang
152a4(mdo sde): dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas la btsun pa bcom ldan
152a5(mdo sde): 'das 'jig rtem dus cher g.yos shing / me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags shes zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
152a6(mdo sde): rnam pa snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di nas 'og gi phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhi 'dun 'das pa de na/ 
152a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khabs yang ngag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes
152a8(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa'i yal dang zhing yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam gyi yul bkod pa'i ting 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byung
152b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lu bstan to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcin
152b2(mdo sde): cig yod pa des/ smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing / snying rje chen po yongasu bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
152b3(mdo sde): nga'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa bshad pa dang / si nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
152b4(mdo sde): bkod pa dang / 'dul ba'i seMn rnams kyang yongasu bzung ba'i sbom lab de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gis dzad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing chod pa'i dus kyi
152b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams med pa byed cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs la sems kyi
152b6(mdo sde): rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba zad yongasu bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po de gcig pu rnam pa zad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ wang dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / 
152b7(mdo sde): dang mi dang / ldan yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sdong po la mchod pad+ma ba spangs ras/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod
152b8(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas ste/ thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa yang brjod par bya'o// sen chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de ba'i na gsheg pa rin po
153a1(mdo sde): / snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to// bang gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i sbyar sngar pus po g.yas pa'i lda ngas la btsugs par gyur pa de'i
153a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi sa chen po dag rnam pa drag tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rang
153a3(mdo sde): tu g.yos shing / 'gul ba dang / me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang tha~Md kyi byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen
153a4(mdo sde): po de dag rab tu sang bar bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang lnga na ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par ba snyan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
153a5(mdo sde): po rnams 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
153a6(mdo sde): la ti nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsnan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin ga shegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul bstan to// // 
153a7(mdo sde): bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnab par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la/ byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par
153a8(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongasu zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs
153b1(mdo sde): ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongasu bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang / 
153b2(mdo sde): 'gogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i seMn rnams kyang yongasu bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ yun ring
153b3(mdo sde): za rje srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid gcig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis
153b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni gdong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin sargya
153b5(mdo sde): padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / ting 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod
153b6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog deng la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
153b7(mdo sde): la nga'i tshig gi dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyed la dri bar mdzad/ me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang
153b8(mdo sde): skur zhing / leg so zhes bya ba yang byin to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
154a1(mdo sde): gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu smras gang bar gyur cing / snying rje chen po'i sgra yang rab tu thob pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ni khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag
154a2(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs
154a3(mdo sde): par 'dzugs par gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed raphyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
154a4(mdo sde): gi rdul dra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang du yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang / grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyuro// skyes bu dang ba'a'i phyir khyod kyis sen byed khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po
154a5(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bcu de/ rab tu bgod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang / bla na med pa
154a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod par gyur te/ de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag
154a7(mdo sde): yongasu bzung ba dag dang 'dul ba'i sen rnams kyang snying rje'i 'od zer dag gis kun du bkab par gyur to// gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du
154a8(mdo sde): bcug nas/ lung bstan pa ma phob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag zad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis
154b1(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul dra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ khyod nyid
154b2(mdo sde): las brtsams cing bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod 'i gso zhes kyang smos shig/ yang de'i tshe ma byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag
154b3(mdo sde): kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'o sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la 'a
154b4(mdo sde): ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang la yan lag gsum gyis leg so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di
154b5(mdo sde): bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du/ sang sa rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lag so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me
154b6(mdo sde): rab rgyas des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na/ khyed cig deng la der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jibs
154b7(mdo sde): pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par 'byed pas/ yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag
154b8(mdo sde): rab tu dga'ang rnam bar 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la me tog zla ba medog mdzes dri ma med pa dang blangs nas
155a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba drag mang po dang lhan gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te/ skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi
155a2(mdo sde): zhing 'di'i 'dzan+d+ra'i tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal du lhags te byin pa dang / de bzhin gshems pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ngo // yang de'i tshe mdzad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
155a3(mdo sde): yang dag rtog theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang ngag dang / lha rnams dang / lto 'phye chen
155a4(mdo sde): be'o bar dag gis 'di ltar yongasu gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i 'tshal las/ til gyi zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing rgyas pa
155a5(mdo sde): kun tu khyab par gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang / theg pa chen po rigs kyi bu rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gi
155a6(mdo sde): yongasu gang zhing khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tingange 'dzin gyi stob dang / 
155a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i na po che'i snying po'i skyon snga na/ bram ze la zad dang ldan pa
155a8(mdo sde): 'khor rnams thal mo sbyar te bsngag pa brjod cing 'khod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mjed me to/ 
155b1(mdo sde): rab rgyas kyis gang lag me tog zlab ro dog 'dzes dri ma med nga 'di dag bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ro// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i 'di yin pa lha snyam nas/ byang chub sems
155b2(mdo sde): dpa' dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/ bram ze de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med da de dag phul nas smras pa/ skyes bu dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sdang ladzad me tog rang
155b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyis/ khyod la me tog zla bar dog radzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur zhing skyes bu dam pa khyod legaso zhes bya ba yang byin te/ yar lag gsum gyis leg so zhes bya ba brjod pa'i bar du yang
155b4(mdo sde): ltar sngar smos pa bzhi ro// me tog gang yin pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu char bzhin du rab tu dab par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu dge ba'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag
155b5(mdo sde): kyang kur gyis gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / snang ba'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / mi 'jigs
155b6(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang / zhi nga'i bsgra dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / 
155b7(mdo sde): pa chen po'i sgra dang / snying rje cher po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i sgra dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi sgra ste/ me tog gi char chen po de dag ga
155b8(mdo sde): dge ba'i sgra de lta bus/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag bkang ste gan so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba chos zab mo la dbang thob pa/ gang dag 'dal
156a1(mdo sde): ba'i ser yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam gyis dbang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing skong pa de dag tu lpags pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / smon
156a2(mdo sde): lar gyi dbang dang / ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis de dag de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brkyang ba de bzhin du khyang
156a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag nas dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog 'dir lpags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub dpa'i
156a4(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis/ de bzhi na gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la mchod pa byas shing zad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la yang mchod pa byas nas/ chos
156a5(mdo sde): nyan pa'i phyir gnas ji lta bu thob par 'khod do// rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de la me tog zla
156a6(mdo sde): ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag gis mchod pa byas te/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ rig kyi
156a7(mdo sde): bu de bzhin gshegs pa'irin po che'i snying po ting 'jad klog gi smon ma zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting 'dzin des thaMng dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dge tog na
156a8(mdo sde): sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyur nas/ ri dang shing ljon pa rnams dang / rtsa dang shing dang sa gzhi zad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du kun tu snang // son gang dag chos
156b1(mdo sde): ma can pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lu su kha cig ni ser po// kha cig ni dkar po/ kha cig gi gtsong ka kha cig ri dmar po/ 2
156b2(mdo sde): cig ni nag po// kha cig ni skya bor gnas te/ kha cig gi lus ni rlung lta bur kun tu snang / kha cig ne me wA bur/ kha cig ni mamakham lta bur/ kha cig mi smig rgyu lta bur/ kha cig ni rilnga
156b3(mdo sde): bur/ kha chig ni tshangs pa lnga bur/ kha cig ni brgya byin lnga bur kha cig ni me tog lnga bur// Sha cig ni rnam par lding wA bu ba kha cag ni seng ge sa bur// kha cig m-i nyim lnga dur/ 'tsham
156b4(mdo sde): zla ba lta bur/ kha cig ni skar ma lnga bur/ kha cig ni bya rgod lta bur/ wa lta bu dag kun tu snang ste/ chos mnyan po'i phyir de ma 'bod pa'i seMn de dag dge ba'i phyogs
156b5(mdo sde): lnga bu yid la byed ma de lta bu'i lus kun snang ngo // rigs kyi bu de na sems cad dag gis rang rang gi lus rdzi lta du ra mthong ba de ltar bur se de dag gis de bzhin gsheg
156b6(mdo sde): rim po che'i snying po'i sku yang mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtsong bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang mdur// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po rin po che sna bdud kyi ngad+ma 'dang ma stong
156b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i za ba la bzhugs par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de na ser gang dag sa dang / na mkha' la 'dug pa 'am/ 'greng ba'i se na re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po 'di ltar mthong
156b8(mdo sde): ske bdag ni de bzhin bshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug ste/ thugs thams cad kyis dgongs bdag gcig pu las brtsams te chos storan to// skar mo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
157a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos/ bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de la leg so zhes bya dbyin te/ bram ze che po snying
157a2(mdo sde): cher po dang lda pa khyod ser bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa rnams la bar bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten la snang ba byed par gyur par snying rje dang ldan pa yin te/ leg so leg so drang ze'ang
157a3(mdo sde): lnga sde dper ma 'o tshom pa zhing phur srung tshogs pa zhig la kha dob sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / reg pa sna tshogs dang / mdang la sna tshogs dang / sdong du sna tshogs dang / rtsang bcog
157a4(mdo sde): dang sman gyi yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod de/ de la me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang / dris ni dpag tshad 'argyar/ kha cig gis ni dngag tshad nyis rgya pal cig gis ni dang 'tshang
157a5(mdo sde): sum brgyar lgang ngo / lhar der byed cing / de bzhin du sbyar / de na me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang / dris ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thad du lgang nge ldan ner byed la/ 
157a6(mdo sde): den son gang dag mig med pa ngag gis/ me tog de'i dri bsnams na ni mig dag thob par 'gyur// 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna ba dag thob par 'gyur yan lag zad kyi bar dag 'an song rma
157a7(mdo sde): byam ni yang las zang thong bar 'gyur ba dang / de nas na gang dag nang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi po dgra gas bcos par gyur pa de dag gis/ dri de bsnams mni nang bang las yongasu bar par 'gyu
157a8(mdo sde): bdag / da min gang dag rgyas pa dag / brgyal ba dang / tshul pa dang / sems chug pa dang sems rnam par ga yeng ba dang / dran pa rab tu rnams pa rnams kyis ma gas dam
157b1(mdo sde): bsnams na ni dran pa zad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la/ me tog ga zhing de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar po mthang ba/ sra ba rdo rje las grub pa/ 'jam pa/ sdong bu ra bai DUr+yA/ 'dab ma mi gser lde bru
157b2(mdo sde): ni rdo'i snying po// za ba ni mu tig dmar po// phang du ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong / rgyar ni dpag tshad 'bum yod pa gcig cig skyes par gyur la/ pad+ma dkar po de'i kha dog dang / dris phyogs
157b3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu khyab cing lgang nge ldan ner 'gyur la/ bram ze phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sang rgyas kyi zhing rdul dra ra
157b4(mdo sde): kyi rdul sbed po de dag ma sen gyi khams gang dag lus mi mthun pa dang / nad kyi len pa dang / yan lag khams pa dang / myos pa dang / 'argyal ba dang / smyos pa dang / bzhid log pa dang / drang pa rab tu
157b5(mdo sde): nyams pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i seMn de dag gis pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsna sa na/ nad zad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing dran pa yang thob par 'gyur
157b6(mdo sde): ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag shi nas yun ring po ma lon zhing lus ma zhig pa de dag gi ro la pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od gzer dag gos pheg gam/ dris reg ra ro nga
157b7(mdo sde): ngag kyang srog gi dbang po 'job par 'gyur zhing yang phyir langs te/ mdza' bshos dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag mthong nas/ de dag zad bskyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan
157b8(mdo sde): lnga po dag 'byor zhing ldan par 'gyur la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang nganas shi 'pho bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar 'gyur la/ de dab de tshe dang gtu meng
158a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing / yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de ras 'i 'phos nas kyang gzhan dag du smra bar mi 'gyur ba zhig yod na/ bram ze me tog gi zhing de ji lta bar theg pa che mtsha
158a2(mdo sde): 'dus pa 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar du'o// ji ltar zhi ma 'char bar nye bar gnas pa'i dus na/ me tog de dag 'a bye zhing rab tu rgyas par gyur nas/ ljang nge lhan ne zhing kha cig pi pad du mi dpag tshad
158a3(mdo sde): brgya kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad stong gi bar du gyur nas/ sem mang po dngag gi nang sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ de ltar ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas zhi ma de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam
158a4(mdo sde): pa byung ba yin no// ji ltar zhi ma shar ba'i 'od gzer dag gi sa me tog de dag 'bye zhing lam me ljang nge ldan ner gyur nas/ nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i son rnams kyi nang nye bar zhi
158a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de ltar mi/ skyes bu dam par 'jig rten du byung ste/ thugs rje chen po'i 'od gzer dag gis son rnams la khyab pa ra mdzad cing khe be nas/ yang dang yang du sor rnams kyi
158a6(mdo sde): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mngon par sbyor bar mdzad pa dang / khyod kyis kyang seMn tshad med grangs med pa dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
158a7(mdo sde): 'dziran du bcug cing / btsud de rab tu bkod nas/ nga la phul ba de dag zad kyis/ nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag yongasu bzung ste/ kha cigi ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dag yongasu bzung
158a8(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni yongasu ma dag pa dag yongasu b.rung zhing / rang rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas kyang lung bstan pa bzhin no// skyes bu dam pa gang dag gis nga'i zad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yod
158b1(mdo sde): su dag pa dag yongasu bzung ba de dag gis mi 'dul ba'i seMn bsam pa dag pa gdul sla ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yong su bzung bas na/ de'i phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
158b2(mdo sde): chen po zhes mi bya ste/ de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po'i bya ba byed pa ma yi no// de dag ni snying rje chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongasu bzung zhing / de ltar sten tshad rje
158b3(mdo sde): grangs me ngapa go du med pa da tshim par byas nga/ nga'i sems nad cig gcig cham yang 'gyod par mgyur pa la ltos/ derangs smon lam 'di lta bu yang btab te/ gal te bdag bla ram med pa
158b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag gi bsam pa 'di yang yongasu rje gas par gyur cig ji ltar bdag gis gling gcig
158b5(mdo sde): gi lus kyis sen zad tshim par byas pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul med lhun po spos 'di'i gling zeng du yang ma stong drag pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed du de lta bu'i lus 'byung
158b6(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ gling gcig tu lo khri'i bar du ji lta ba de bzhin du gling bang du yang rang gi sha dang khrag dang lpags pa dang / mig dang rna ba dang / sna dang mchu dang lce dang sgra rag gis seMn thang tshim par ba
158b7(mdo sde): shing / theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par gyur cig/ mi rnams dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas thang dang / gang dag sha za zhing khrag mthung ba so'i gan
158b8(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang / than gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi bar de dag kyang bdag gis tshim par byed par gyur cig/ ji ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu rang gi lus kyis seMn thad tshim par byed par 'gyur
159a1(mdo sde): ba de bzhin du/ phyogs btsa'i kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu yang rang gi sha dang brag dang lpags pa dang / mig dang lce'i bar dag dang / de lta ba'i lus
159a2(mdo sde): kyis bskal pa cher po badz+ra'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / de dag de lta bu'i lus thob nas/ rang gi lus dang srog gis son rnams tshims par byed par gyur cig/ gal te bdag sems
159a3(mdo sde): tshim par bya ba'i phyir// rang gi lus de lta bu dag yongasu gtong bar mi byed dam/ ji ltar bdag ra zhing sems pa'i bdag gi smon lam de lta bu yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur na/ gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs
159a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis bslus par gyur cig/ 
159a5(mdo sde): bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par ma gyur
159a6(mdo sde): cig chos kyi sgra yang mi thos/ dge 'dun gyi sgra yang mi thos/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yang mi thos/ bdud kyi dpung pham pa'i sgra yang mi thos/ mi 'jigs pa'i sgra yang mi zos pa nas/ 'khor ba na
159a7(mdo sde): dge ba'i slo bar yang thos par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag tu mnar med pa'i son dmyal ba chen po na gnas par gyur cig ces smon lam de lta bu yang data // ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling zad
159a8(mdo sde): kyi gling re rer yang de lta bu'i lus ngag yongasu btang zhing / rang gi sha dang khrag gis sen rnams tshim par byas pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+ma'i klung gi bye ma sbed
159b1(mdo sde): ngag tu yang de lta bu'i lus dag yongasu btang ste/ rang gi sha dang khrag gis sen rnams tshim par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de'i tshangs rgyun ma chad par mig dag yongasu btang ba gang yin pa de dag gi phung po
159b2(mdo sde): yang 'dzam+bu gling 'di nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lnga'i mthar thug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus yongasu gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ltos/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin
159b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'o lus yongasu gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mdor bsdus pa yin no// sems la byung ba dag la 'jug pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ sem thang la snying rje ba'i
159b4(mdo sde): phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yong su tshol ba ma yin te/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag pa de dag yong su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni snying
159b5(mdo sde): dartse ba spangs pa yin no// gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgya sa kyi theg pa dag yongasu spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni ye shes dang bsam
159b6(mdo sde): ba la mkhas par gyur pa ma yin no// gang dag ji ltar bdag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas spangs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'gogs par gyur pa/ bud maud rnam par spangs pa/ seMn dmyal ba dang / dud 'go'i skye
159b7(mdo sde): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig theg pa chen pa'i yang
159b8(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongasu spangs pa theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos ston par gyur cig/ bdag gis byang chub zo
160a1(mdo sde): nas kyang tshe ring por gyur te// yun ring du gnas shing bskal pa mang por bsam pa dag pa dang / gdul sla ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams la chos ston par gyur sa
160a2(mdo sde): ces smon lam de lta bu 'debs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ des na ye shes dang bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa yang ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya'o// rigs
160a3(mdo sde): kyi bu de nas de bzhim gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ngas phyag brkyang sde/ sor mo lnga las 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma/ kha deg 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa dag rab tu bgyi'o// 'od gzer de pa/ 
160a4(mdo sde): tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i phyogasu dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnabs snang bar byas nas/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can de na
160a5(mdo sde): mi rnams ni/ tshe lo bcu pa/ mdog ngan pa/ mi sdug pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / ldan pa ste/ blun ni mthe ngo'i tshad tsam mo// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
160a6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i khrun yang rtsod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi mi rnams kyi khru gang dang / mthe bo tsan gyi mi rnams kyi khru gsum dang / 
160a7(mdo sde): sor bdun gyi tshad tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'khor bzhi ngo rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston to// rigs kyi bu de nas zang dang ldan pa'i
160a8(mdo sde): des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ring po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs
160b1(mdo sde): pa skar ma la dga' ba des ni/ bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med pa 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdug mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang po bla na med pa yang dag
160b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed de/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chur yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing badrud de rab tu bkod ngo do// sem
160b3(mdo sde): ngag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar/ bsam nyan ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab ste/ khe cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gno
160b4(mdo sde): bkod pa yongasu dag padag yongasu bzung ngo // kha cig gis ni yongasu ma dag pa sdigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag yongasu bzung / de nas sen chen po des pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
160b5(mdo sde): nga'i byang chub yang dag 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste/ rang tu gnas par byas nas/ der rangs de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan snga
160b6(mdo sde): snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab bo// de bzhin gshegs
160b7(mdo sde): pa des kyang ngal leg so zhes bya ba byin nas/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de na gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i dge ba'i bshes gzhan
160b8(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa des snyibs ma lnga shin tu bdo 'ang nyon mongs pa dang / rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe// shin tu nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sem mtsham
161a1(mdo sde): med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dang ldan pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyams nga bar zhugs par dang / smon lam gyis yod
161a2(mdo sde): su bzung nas/ skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
161a3(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyis kyang leg so zhes pho nya btang ste/ snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar ming btag so// nga'i dge pa'i gshes gnyen phan pa mdzad pa / byang chub sems dpa'
161a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhib de/ da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can du mthe bo'i tshad tsam du mi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs
161a5(mdo sde): rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang+gA gang tsam po des mtshan natshad tsam gyi mi de dag rkang \u0f7fgru gsum gyi chang tsam gyis/ skye dgu tshe lo bcu brna
161a6(mdo sde): lachos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// des dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bac+doMs gang
161a7(mdo sde): dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rter gyi khams tshad meng grangs med pa dag ra bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ ngo ka dag bta // des dang
161a8(mdo sde): po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de// rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyis byas pa
161b1(mdo sde): bzo zhing rjesu dgongs pa de dag gis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro// bram ze sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba dag na/ sen
161b2(mdo sde): tshe ring ba bsam pa yongasu dag pa/ bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa
161b3(mdo sde): snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ son mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / ldan par gyur pa'i bar dag la tshe thung dus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po ldan
161b4(mdo sde): par mdzad cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos ston pa la ltos// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu ngan cing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i
161b5(mdo sde): mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba'i sen rnams yongasu bzung zhing / smon la ma khyad par can btab pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro
161b6(mdo sde): 'di dag thaMd zil gyis mnan to// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis sen du myal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas yong su spangs pa dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yongasu spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
161b7(mdo sde): zhing yongasu dag pa rnams yongasu bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sen bsam pa dag pa shin tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongasu bzung ba'i sen de dag ni me tog lta bu zhes bya ste/ gang dag shin tu
161b8(mdo sde): dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi nang du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ pad+ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no// bram ze byang
162a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyile mo ba tshor ba'i sde/ bani gang 'as ra sangs rgyas kyi yang yong su dag par spor ba dang / se ngas par yongasu dag pa rnams pa/ sangs rgya
162a2(mdo sde): mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar slor ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ri byang chub sa
162a3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams shes bya'i// pad+ma dkar po lta bu yang ma yin la/ sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ bram ze 'di
162a4(mdo sde): lta ste dper ra/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis gang gi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu ma dag pa yongasu bzung zhing 'dul ba'i ser lon mongs pas
162a5(mdo sde): dkrugs pa rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongasu bzung ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po ni
162a6(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag yin te kha ni gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu ma dag pa smod pa dang / sen bsam pa yongasu ma dag pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smod pa dang / byang chub tho na
162a7(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi thung ba zhig par mar sgrub par smon pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni
162a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dkar po rnams shes bya'i// me tog lnga
162b1(mdo sde): bu rnams shes mi bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' chen po rnams shes kyang bya'o// bram ze 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyod ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa
162b2(mdo sde): spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi nang du/ dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snying rje pad+ma dkar po lta bur skyes pa yin no// gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod
162b3(mdo sde): ngas mtshams pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongasu bzung zhing snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu bzung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i sa
162b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul sbed dag kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs zhes bya ba byin te/ ngo gdag kyang btang nas khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan
162b5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya bar btag so// 'khor 'di dag thaMd kyang khyod la mtshod nga'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// snying rje chen bo dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa
162b6(mdo sde): meng pa gang+gA'i klung gi be ma snyed cig 'das nas/ lhag ma bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der/ skye dgu'i
162b7(mdo sde): ma lo brgya 'i shu thub cing / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jig rten ldongs pa 'dren pa med pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing / seMn lam ngan pas bcom pa/ nyam
162b8(mdo sde): ngab chen po thob pa mtshams med pa byed pa 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs gdam pa'i ches spongs ga ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'thung ba nas/ ji skad sngar smom pa'i bar rab sa dus gang ba'i 'jig
163a1(mdo sde): rten du de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhang su ldan pa nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur te/ 'gro ba'i 'khor lo mo bzlos/ chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor dbang bskur
163a2(mdo sde): dadud dang / nyon mongs pa'i dadung ni bcil te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi 'ang mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu smras khyab par byas nas/ khyod kyi lan thos 'dus pa chen po ngag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta snga
163a3(mdo sde): dge slong spong gis brgya lnga bcu dang lhar cig smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du lo bzhi cu rtsa lngar rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mtha' dag yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyu'o// de'i tshe na ji ltar
163a4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dpag med ces bya bar 'gyur zhing bskal pa tshad med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du// snying rje chen
163a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa khyod kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 
163a6(mdo sde): bani bcu rtsa lngas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyuraro// skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa'i yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos lo stong lhag par gnas
163a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang / lus skyes pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rang gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po mtha' das byed par 'gyur
163a8(mdo sde): te/ sngar ji skad smos pa de bzhin du/ yun ring por sem rnams 'dul bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na gnas 'gro zhes bya ba na/ bram ze zhig yod pa des 'di skad ces smra so// skyes bu dam pa khyod bskal
163b1(mdo sde): bgrangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag kyang brtag tu bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing / byams pa dang 'thun pa'i yo byad sbyor ba dang / 'grogs par byed par gyur nas/ khyod la bsnyem
163b2(mdo sde): bkur rnyed par gyur cig/ khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur na/ bdag khyod kyi bar gyur cig/ skyes bu dam pa bdag khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i sbyin bdag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing / khyod kyi bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
163b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ gzhan yang de na rgya mtsho'i lha mo shin tu dul ba'i blo zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag ces bya ba nas/ khyod kyis srid pa tha ma pa'i
163b4(mdo sde): bar du gyur pa na/ bdag khyod skyes pa'i mar gyur cig/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis byang chub zeb ni// bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stor bar gyur cag rdzun
163b5(mdo sde): lha mo mu lnga sprod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ de dang de dag ces bya nga nas khyod srid pa za ma nga'i bar du gyur pa ma/ bdag khyod sna na bI pa ma byed par mar gyur cig khyod kyi byang chung thob ras bdag
163b6(mdo sde): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ brgya byin mu khyud can zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang brgya byin pha rol sems shes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyang smras pa/ kye snying rje chen po dang
163b7(mdo sde): ldan pa bdag cag kyang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod kyis byang chub thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bdag cag shes rab dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ldan thos zung du gyur cig/ gzhan yang brgya byin

164a1(mdo sde): ri'i rtse'i lha mo ngas pa king dgu ka zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod kyi btsun mor gyur cig/ khyod kyis byang chu
164a2(mdo sde): thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bston par gyur cig/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mdzes spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod bskal pa grangs med
164a3(mdo sde): pa de dang de dag tu byang grub kyi spyang ba sbyong bar/ bdag kyang skyes bu dang khyod la byams pa dang 'bud pa'i yo byad kyis grogs byed pa'i bran zhing du gyur te/ khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig khyod srid pa
164a4(mdo sde): pham par gyur pa la yang bdag bsnyen bkur byed par gyur chog/ skyes du dbang khyod kyis byang chub thob nas kyang chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par gyur cig khyod kyi
164a5(mdo sde): chos bstan pa bdag gis dang por 'bras bu dang bcas par bya da par gyur cig/ chos kyi bcud kyang 'thung bar gyur cig/ 'chi ba med pa yang rtogs par gyur cig/ tshor mongs

164a8(mdo sde): yo byad mang po dag gis grogs byed par gyur cig/ bdag bskal pa dang ga tu med pa dag tu khyod la 'bras bu dang chas por spyod cing nye bar 'tsho nga'i le dur gyur cig/ rtag tu dngos po bslang ba'i dod

165a1(mdo sde): khrag khrib 'bub phrag lag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chud kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bdag gi mdun
